content:
if we disregard the government policies, social cohesion and individual preparedness, which cities are most likely to survive the crises I mentioned, and develop into city-states. 

I imagine that the blast would take out all the cities east of the rocky mountains, and maybe west from New York. Down south almost to Houston TX. etc. so everything outside would initially have some problems with their tech and computers, but be repaired in days or weeks.
